resolution_summary: Password reset instructions sent successfully after verifying user identity.

conversation_history.message: I forgot my password and cannot log in.
I can help. Have you tried using the 'Forgot Password' link?
Reset email was delivered and user confirmed access.

resolution_summary: Login locked due to too many failed attempts. User unlocked and authenticated.

conversation_history.message: My account is locked. It says too many attempts.
I see multiple failed logins. I unlocked the account.

resolution_summary: 2FA code delivery issue resolved by switching user to TOTP.

conversation_history.message: Im not receiving my 2FA SMS codes.
Your carrier is blocking short codes. Recommend using an authenticator app.
User switched to TOTP and logged in successfully.

resolution_summary: Password reset link failing due to expired token. User given new secure link.

conversation_history.message: The reset link says it's expired. I can't change my password.
The token expires after 30 minutes. I generated a new link.

resolution_summary: SAML SSO login failing due to incorrect Assertion Consumer Service (ACS) URL.

conversation_history.message: Our SSO login fails with an invalid ACS URL error.
The ACS URL in your IdP config was incorrect.

resolution_summary: OAuth integration resolved by refreshing expired client secret.

conversation_history.message: We're getting invalid client secret errors.
The API secret expired last week. Generated a new one.

resolution_summary: User could not reset password due to unverified email address. After verification, reset succeeded.

conversation_history.message: I didn't get the password reset email.
Your email was not verified. I re-sent the verification email.

resolution_summary: Login error caused by corrupted cached session tokens.

conversation_history.message: I keep getting 'session invalid' even after logging out.
Local token storage was corrupted. Clearing cache fixed it.

resolution_summary: Incorrect username was being used. User successfully authenticated after correction.

conversation_history.message: Password reset still doesn't work; it says my email doesn't exist.
Your login is actually your username, not your email.

resolution_summary: Email deliverability issue traced to customer SMTP misconfiguration.

conversation_history.message: None of our reset emails reach our users.
Your SMTP connector was failing SPF validation.
After fixing DNS, emails were delivered.
